lead_paragraph: An article in some editions last Sunday about the Man o’ War Stakes at Belmont Park, in which Red Rocks defeated Curlin by two lengths, misstated the year that Red Rocks was the Breeders’ Cup Turf champion. It was 2006, not last year.
snippet: An article in some editions last Sunday about the Man o’ War Stakes at Belmont Park, in which Red Rocks defeated Curlin by two lengths, misstated the year that Red Rocks was the Breeders’ Cup Turf champion. It was 2006, not last year.
